title: Studio, 1, 2 + 3 BRs | Floor-to-Ceiling Windows in The Loop
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Hi all!  Private studio, 1, 2 + 3 BR apts are available, located in a modern/pet-friendly building that offers top-notch amenities! You'll enjoy the open concept space, with floor-to-ceiling windows and stunning views! Starting at $1,975/month (utilities separate) with flexible start dates and lease lengths (9-12 months). Pricing depends on lease length and unit availability.  Details:  - Private apartments (unfurnished) - Floor-to-ceiling windows - Stainless steel appliances - Central AC/heating - In-unit washer and dryer - Pool and sundeck - Fitness center - Resident lounge/workspaces - Garage parking and bike storage - Game room - 24/7 concierge - Pet friendly  The property is within a short walking distance of the Clark/Lake and Washington/Wells stations. Please reach out to schedule a virtual or in-person tour!
